hasPart.name: First Law of Robotics
hasPart.text: A robot may not injure a human being or, through inaction, allow a human being to come to harm.

hasPart.name: Second Law of Robotics
hasPart.text: A robot must obey the orders given it by human beings except where such orders would conflict with the First Law.

hasPart.name: Third Law of Robotics
hasPart.text: A robot must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with the First or Second Law.
